quotes.quote: Show me someone who has done something worthwhile, and I'll show you someone who has overcome adversity.
You cannot show people only the petals and not the thorns. It's not fair to them.
There's something which impels us to show our inner souls. The more courageous we are, the more we succeed in explaining what we know.
Show me a hero and I'll write you a tragedy.
Show me a good loser and I'll show you an idiot.
Show me a thoroughly satisfied man and I will show you a failure.
Outside show is a poor substitute for inner worth.
Show me an elitist, and I'll show you a loser.
Those who show off do not shine.
You show your worth by what you seek.
To show that you truly care, you listen.
A show of daring oft conceals great fear.
Show me a sane man and I will cure him for you.
Show the readers everything, tell them nothing.
Show a little faith, there's magic in the night.
Show more interest in their story than your own.
When someone shows you who they are, believe them the first time.
Show me a smile, and I'll show you one back.
When you show deep empathy toward others, their defensive energy goes down, and positive energy replaces it. That's when you can get more creative in solving problems.

When people show loyalty to you, you take care of those who are with you. It's how it goes with everything. If you have a small circle of friends, and one of those friends doesn't stay loyal to you, they don't stay your friend for very long.
Show class, have pride, and display character. If you do, winning takes care of itself.
Show people a positive path that enables them to make progress on their own terms. Give them options and alternatives that empower them.
Show me a poorly uniformed troop and I'll show you a poorly uniformed leader.
Why not show off if you've got something to show?
I don't have to show anything to anyone. There is nothing to prove.
Every show could be the last one.
Show me a liar, and I'll show you a thief.
Show no love, cause love will get you killed.
Show true religion, cause words don't relieve
Show my head to the people. It is worth seeing.
